name: tamerbooth
description: A photobooth webapp using DSLR to take pictures with gphoto2

scripts.camera: concurrently --kill-others "npm run server" "cd camera_capture && ng serve --proxy-config proxy.conf.json  --host 0.0.0.0"
scripts.build: cd admin && npm run build && cd ../camera_capture && npm run build && cd ../front && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd admin && npm install && cd ../camera_capture && npm install && cd ../front && npm install && cd ../common && npm install

author: Denis Messi√©
